WorkItem.ClosedComment: Checked, we aren't using an ICD on this
WorkItem.Description: I am not sure if the Rawr hunter module imitates the Excel spreadsheet, but testing has shown the 2 piece tier 10 proc to not have an internal cooldown.  The current spreadsheet has it listed at a 45 sec internal cooldown.

Comments.Message:
I'm referencing the sheet for sanity checks but I'm not directly using their formulas anymore (the Hunter module used to be basically a second output of what the spreadsheet does, almost exactly). I have since completely redone about 80% of the model so it doesn't work like that anymore.

Do you have a direct source regarding the T10 2P? I can look into it from there.

http://elitistjerks.com/f74/t30710-wotlk_dps_spreadsheet/p159/
